tool_description: This API allows you to retrieve information about a specific video on Youtube. You can use it to retrieve details such as the video title, description, thumbnail, video, gif. With the Youtube Downloader API, you can easily access and leverage the wealth of information available on Youtube.  telegram DM: https://t.me/justmobicode
name: YouTube Media Downloader
title: YouTube Media Downloader

api_list.name: Download Youtube Video
api_list.description: This API endpoint allows users to download YouTube videos & shorts videos by providing the video URL as input.
